Highlight chat messages from your viewer: Highlight chat messages from your viewers on your stream.
Pin and highlight chat messages from you: Pin and highlight chat messages from your viewers on your stream.
Use this widget by hovering over the rig: Use this widget by hovering over the right side of a chat message to see a thumbtack icon. Clicking the icon will pin the message to the widget for its duration, or until you click the unpin button.
